frontmatter.title: Web Design VS Web Development
frontmatter.desc: In this article, you can read about the difference between Web Design and Web Development, as well as, where you can learn for being a web designer or a web developer.
frontmatter.phrase: A successful website does three things: It attracts the right kinds of visitors. Guides them to the main services or product you offer. Collect Contact details for future ongoing relation.
frontmatter.author: Mohamed Saad
